title: UIC Global Partnership | Office of Global Engagement | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: The University of Illinois at Chicago launched UIC Global, its partnership with Shorelight Education, in January 2017.Chancellor Michael Amiridis and Provost Susan Poser envisioned UIC Global as a key part of the University’s strategy to increase undergraduate international student enrollment at UIC.  In addition to other benefits, increasing the international student population provides an opportunity to create a more globally engaged campus, bringing together students from diverse international and U.S. backgrounds in our classrooms, residence halls, dining facilities, and other venues.
